start: Hi friend! What can I assist you with today? Please respond with the number you’d like to choose from the following options:
1 A Fantastic Introduction: A visual showcase of each member’s unique superpowers.
2 FAN-tastic Fanalyzer: A custom program celebrating MCU fandom on X.
3 Greeting From Galactus: Receive messages from Galactus—from space.
4 Family Dinner Roundtable: Cast Q&A Dinner Time “LIVE” Event.
OR reply ‘Flame Off’ to end the chat.
1: Great choice! My family are The Fantastic Four, but each of them are fantastic on their own—so some fantastic introductions are in order.
We’ll celebrate Mr Fantastic, The Invisible Woman, The Human Torch, and The Thing, each with their unique superpowers coming to life on X over a 4-day countdown.
Like a Hashmoji and Custom Like:
[*INSERT* MOCKUP of HASHMOJI left / Animated GIF Custom Like right]
These are all great ways to brand the moment and delight fans in the conversation. P.S. We can tie this to character poster drops to make an even bigger splash!
What else would you like to see? Respond with a number.
OR reply ‘Flame Off’ to end the chat.
2: Another fun one! This is where we welcome The Fantastic Four into the MCU by celebrating MCU fandom on X via an ALL-NEW Advanced Profile Analyzer—aka a Fanalyzer.
We’ll get fans on X to ‘like’ a post to opt in and have their profiles analyzed.
Fans will then receive a highly shareable F4-style comic to their @mentions with their personalized MCU fandom results.
[*INSERT* GIF OF PROMOTED CTA POST BEING LIKED, THEN FLIPPING TO THE @MENTION NOTIFICATION]
We’ll be able to tell fans what percentage of fans they fall into, what their top MCU fandom is, what their superpower is, and which Fantastic Four character they’re assigned.
What else would you like to see? Respond with a number.
OR reply ‘Flame Off’ to end the chat.
3: Oooooh, Galactus is a very real threat. X thrives on breaking news moments—so let’s play into that and make Galactus feel like a real, imminent threat across X.
So, we’ll work with Sent Into Space, to take beautiful photos of the earth’s orbit from space, and then overlay them with a postcard greeting from Galactus—as well as his big ominous shadow.
Fans can like a post on X to be sent their own unique greeting from Galactus….FROM SPACE!
[*INSERT* GIF OF PROMOTED CTA POST BEING LIKED, THEN FLIPPING TO THE @MENTION NOTIFICATION]
[*INSERT* GIF OF Multiple Postcards animated across]
What else would you like to see? Respond with a number.
OR reply ‘Flame Off’ to end the chat.
4: Family dinner is Sunday at 7 on the dot (I should know, I’m usually the one cooking it!)
My family will answer fan questions sourced from @Movies over a “live” roundtable dinner discussion streamed in an event page.
What else would you like to see?
OR reply ‘Flame Off’ to end the chat.
flameoff: Kthanksbye! Catch my family in theaters 7/25!
Reply ‘Hi’ to start the chat again.
